poemsDataJson.list_full: 春(はる)過(す)ぎて 夏(なつ)来(き)にけらし 白妙(しろたへ)の 衣(ころも)ほすてふ 天(あま)の香具山(かぐやま)
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: The spring has passed//And the summer come again;//For the silk-white robes,//So they say, are spread to dry//On the "Mount of Heaven's Perfume".
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Haru sugite|Natsu ki ni kerashi|Shirotae no|Koromo hosu chō|Ama no Kagu-yama
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: ころもほすてふ あまのかくやま
poemsDataJson.author: 持統天皇(じとうてんのう)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: さわやかな夏のおとずれ、時の推移
